author: Rev says desu
description:
Just when you thought things couldn't get worse for Ubisoft, it has. Despite the Tencent deal, Ubisoft stock continues to plummet. Also, marketing rates for Assassin's Creed Shadows have been revealed.

title: Ubisoft Hits Rock Bottom As Investors SLAM Tencent Deal And Tone-Deaf "Creator Rates" EXPOSED
